alert.note: Alert for Archer; Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 30 at 2:47AM CDT until March 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Fire weather watch for western and northern Oklahoma and western north Texas Friday afternoon... .Rapid warming and drying on Friday afternoon behind a dryline, combined with strong wind gusts, will lead to critical to extremely critical fire weather. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR WARM TEMPERATURES, LOW HUMIDITY, AND STRONG WINDS FOR CENTRAL OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... * WINDS...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
